full_description:
ELITE 1 Ton Non-Inverter AC (Split Type EHS-12CRN)

The ELITE 1 Ton Non-Inverter AC (Split Type EHS-12CRN) has an excellent set of features designed to provide maximum comfort and convenience. This ELITE 1-ton Split Non-Inverter AC effectively distributes air around the room in two directions, removing hot spots and guaranteeing steady cooling. Its 3-stage energy efficiency rating allows you to save much money on your electricity bill while simultaneously maintaining comfort and minimizing energy use. The ELITE 1-Ton Non-Inverter AC (Split Type EHS-12CRN) readily detachable panel makes maintenance simple and hassle-free by providing easy access for cleaning and maintenance. Adding an anti-fungus bacterial filter improves indoor air quality by guaranteeing that the air you breathe is pure and healthful. This split AC is eco-friendly because it saves an impressive 40% on energy. Even in hot and muggy weather, it works well because of its strong ambient cooling capacity. While features like auto swing, 3D airflow, and flash cool improve the overall cooling experience, the washable filters make maintenance even easier. This unit is ISO, BSTI approved, and BUET tested, guaranteeing quality and performance. It is outfitted with a dependable GMCC compressor. The unit's components are made more durable and fresh by the golden fin with fresh air function. With its silent operation at 40 dB indoor commotion level, it guarantees a calm atmosphere. The dynamic carbon deodorizer also gets rid of offensive smells, leaving your room feeling fresh. With a 12000 BTU capacity, this ELITE 1 Ton Non-Inverter AC (Split Type EHS-12CRN) is appropriate for spaces between 80 and 120 square feet.

Buy ELITE 1 Ton Non-Inverter AC (Split Type EHS-12CRN) from Star Tech

In Bangladesh, you can get original ELITE 1 Ton Non-Inverter AC (Split Type EHS-12CRN) From Star Tech. We have a large collection of latest Elite Air Conditionar to purchase. Order Online Or Visit your Nearest Star Tech Shop to get yours at lowest price. The ELITE 1 Ton Non-Inverter AC (Split Type EHS-12CRN) has 05 Years Compressor & 01 Year Spare Parts Warranty (The Elite warranty card must be kept for any warranty).

This type of air conditioner is the most popular as the compressor and the condenser cooling fan (located in the outer, street block) are separated from the evaporator blower (located in the interior, indoor unit).
